rename.from: SQLite's StatementWorker consumes 100% inside its busy loop

body: I'm being bit by this, too, and definitely wouldn't mind a 0.7 microsecond overhead per query.  (BTW, thanks for investigating this, @Patryk27)

Thanks a lot for digging into this. StatementWorker is definitely pretty experimental and if we can keep the perf similar I'm totally open to re-arranging it. What you suggest seems pretty good at first glance. 

Are you open to sending in a PR with the changes?

issue.title: A core of CPU is occupied 100% when a query returns an error
